name: bot
content:
bot noun [C]
(COMPUTING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a computer program that works automatically, especially one that searches for and finds information on the internet: Criminals create networks of bots that roam the internet infecting PCs with malware.

IT, PRODUCTION
  informal a
robot
IT, INTERNET a computer program that works automatically, especially one that searches for and finds information on the internet: The state computer fell victim to an automated bot, which probes for security weaknesses, officials said. See also
shopping bot
